phoenix

Class comskip

  • java.lang.Object
    • phoenix.comskip

  • public final class comskip
extends java.lang.Object
    API Generated: Tue May 17 06:47:42 EDT 2016
    API Source: CommercialAPI
    API for reading EDL Files for commercial skip. An EDL file has the following Structure... 

     83.78    299.27  0
 832.90  1018.22 0
 1646.11 1806.20 0
 2347.91 2583.15 0
 3052.78 3208.00 0
 3786.92 3899.46 0

      return the stop value for the commercial

      • GetCommercialFile

        public static java.io.File GetCommercialFile(java.lang.Object mediaFile)
        For the given medai file, return the .edl file
        Parameters:
        mediaFile - Sage MediaFile or VFS MediaFile
        Returns:
        File representing the .edl file. It may not exist.

      • HasCommercials

        public static boolean HasCommercials(java.lang.Object mediaFile)
        Return true if an edl file file exists, AND it has some content
        Parameters:
        mediaFile - Sage MediaFile or VFS MediaFile
        Returns:
        true if the file exists and has content

      • GetCommercials

        public static CommercialStruct[] GetCommercials(java.lang.Object mediaFile)
        Return the Commercial start and stop points as an Array of CommercialStruct items
        Parameters:
        mediaFile - Sage MediaFile or VFS MediaFile
        Returns:
        Array of CommercialStruct items or null if there are no commercials
